Description:
UNDER CONTRACT - OPEN CANCELLED
This brand new home is perfect for the owner occupier or the astute investor. Situated in a fantastic location close to shops and public transport is this 2 bedroom unit. Both of the bedrooms feature built in robes with access from the main bedroom out to the courtyard and are both serviced by a centrally located bathroom. Open plan living and dining area with split system air con, timber laminate flooring and a kitchen that features electric oven, gas hotplates, dishwasher and stone bench tops. A sliding door leads out to a paved entertaining area with access to the oversized single garage which has built in storage and remote access. Priced for immediate sale.
Insights: 1 other 2 bedroom unit in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New Home Not to Be Missed!!!
YES, you have read it right. This brand new 4 Bedroom home could be yours either you are looking for First Home or Investment.
Just a couple of minutes drive from Schools, Colleges, Supermarket and Train Station, MK Realty is proud to represent this beautifully planned 4 Bedroom 2 Bathroom and 2 Garage home with low maintenance front lawn and back yard. This home is perfect for First home buyers or Investors, young families or old couples, growing kids or for someone who need to move to a totally new home.
This home will give you 7 years home owner warranty, quality inclusions, 5KW reverse cycle airconditioning (Heating/Cooling), caeserstone benchtop to kitchen and vanities, 900mm stainless steel appliances, downlights throughout and with complete fencing.
Don't miss the chance to have a look before it is SOLD. Kindly contact Manjot Singh (Mandy) on 0449258722 or Patrick on 0424936180 for more information or to book a private inspection.
Photos are illustration purposes only.
Photo ID is must for all open home inspections and private inspections.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
ONE AND A QUARTER ACRES OF PEACE AND PRIVACY
Enjoy your own private haven, positioned on over an acre complete with pony paddock and just a few minutes from Arena shopping hub, a range of quality schools both public and private as well as all desired amenities including public transport.
The neat and tidy home is perfect for a small family just as it is or immerse yourself in the perfect project with a renovation only limited by your imagination.
Boasting three bedrooms all with built in robes, spacious living room and open plan kitchen dining room, outdoor entertaining area, ducted heating and A/C ensuring your comfort is met.
Moving outdoors you will be delighted with the shedding suitable to accommodate four vehicles, mains water, supplementary tank water, fully cleared and fenced land.
For further information contact Jeanine on 0438 332 411.

Description:
Nest or Invest
Please follow us on Facebook and YouTube for regular fresh content search "Babet Brothers Real Estate".
Welcome to your next home!
This property is absolutely perfect and is only a couple of years old. It is perfect for all buyers, whether this is your first home, a downsize or an investment. The home is well thoughtout in its design and there is nothing to spend. Just pack your things and move straight in!
Upon entering the home you are greeted with the spacious master bedroom which features an ensuite with shower and toilet and a good sized walk in robe! The other 2 bedrooms of the home are very spacious and feature built in robes.
The main bathroom has a tub and high quality stainless steel fixtures and fittings.
The main living area is open plan in its design, the kitchen over looks the lounge and dining area so that the chef of the home can be right there in the action whilst preparing meals for their family and friends. The kitchen features enough space for a large double fridge and has a walk in pantry as well, how good is that. Other features are a 900mm oven and range hood.
The property features a very good sized yard with plenty of space for kids to play or even a family pet. There is a built in fire pit and patio for outdoor entertaining! The garage is remote controlled and there is internal access to the garage from the house.
The location of this property is excellent. Within only a few minutes there are:
- Shops, Medical centres
- Freeway access
- Officer & Cardinia Road Train stations
- Officer Secondary college & Primary schools
- Parks & open spaces
Don't miss out on this property, it will go very fast, contact the Babet Brothers today to avoid disappontment.

Description:
TITLED READY TO GO 387m2
Heritage Rise Estate is evolving as one of the most sought after locations in Officer. Adjacent to Beaconsfield and Berwick this master planned estate benefits from walking/cycling trails, parks and just a few minutes from access to the M1 freeway. Bus routes, trains stations nearby and a raft of public and private schools you will also be within walking distance of a future new shopping centre.12.5sqm frontage benched level site you will be surrounded by homes of quality on the north side of the highway. Views to the rolling tree lined foothills make this a premium position.

Description:
Contemporary living in Officer
This contemporary home offers instant appeal with its modern facade.
Water-park views and its fantastic location. Situated in Arcadia Estate, this Officer estate is highly sought after for its affordability and location.
Step inside this modern beauty and enter the heart of the home. 2 bedrooms + Study. with a light filled contemporary gourmet kitchen equipped with stone benches, glass splash-back, stainless steel appliances, overhead cupboards and adjoining meals area overlooking the wetlands. Continuing through the home, into the spacious living room with natural light which oversees the outdoor courtyard and easy to maintain backyard.
The master bedroom with built in robes and 2nd bedroom with built in robes are serviced by the functional main bathroom / separate powder room.
Single remote control garage, limited maintenance gardens to the front and back, split system air conditioning.
If location is what matters to you look no further, shops, public transport, easy freeway access, Schools and more all minutes away from your front door.
Whether you're an investor, first home buyer or downsizing, this home is sure to tick all the right boxes and won't last long

Description:
All the bells and whistles
Situated in a delightful cul de sac within the Arena Estate is this attractive 4 bedroom plus study ex display home featuring 4 large living areas.
- Boasting; Hostess style kitchen with Caesar stone benches, 900 mm stainless steel oven and butler's pantry and opening to the family/meals area which leads to a rumpus room. (only separated by a 2-way gas log fire) that heats up both areas!
- Other living areas including a front lounge and an impressive upstairs retreat area. You'll also love the evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, plantation shutters, quality carpets and porcelain tiles throughout the home!
- The palatial master bedroom with stunning full en-suite is a key feature of the home as is the amazing timber lined alfresco which opens from bi fold stacker doors and contains a fireplace and built in BBQ.
Located close to the Arena Shopping Centre and within close proximity to the freeway this family home is both convenient and feature filled.

Description:
Modern & Stylish Home in Arena.
Positioned high on the hill with outstanding views & surrounded by parklands plus located in one of Officer's most highly sought after estates "Arena" is this stylish & modern townhouse. Externally & internally this home has endless features that will both capture the eye & allow for maximum comfort with minimal maintenance. Comprising:
* Three bedrooms plus an upstairs private study/retreat area. The large & oversized master bedroom offers (BIR), private ensuite plus the bonus personal balcony. Remaining bedrooms all with fitted robes & share a further bathroom.
* An open plan kitchen with plenty of under bench & overhead cupboard space & complemented with modern s/s appliances.
* Main large & open downstairs living area with separated dining/meals zone.
* Outside offers you a large & very private sun filled decked entertaining zone to be enjoyed all year round.
Other features include split system heating & cooling, remote double garage with internal house access, large laundry, downstairs toilet, low maintenance gardens & so much more...
Live opposite the parklands in this very private location that also allows short walking distance to the local Arena Shopping Centre, Cardinia Road train station. Plus with freeway access very close by.. Do not miss..

Description:
Stylish Living – Stunning Location
Looking for a low maintenance lifestyle with out skimping on the luxuries? Stop the search because here it is. This modern well equipped home is situated in the ideal location literally seconds by foot from the Power Way Park. Being only 3 years old externally and internally this property has endless features that will both capture the eye and allow for maximum comfort with minimal maintenance.
The home offers three bedrooms, the master with walk in wardrobe and ensuite, bedrooms 2 & 3 are comfortable in size and located at the front of the home. Open plan kitchen/meals/dining area that is light filled and flows with all the extras such as stone bench tops, high-end European style appliances including a self cleaning pyrolytic oven, a combination steam oven, 900mm induction cook top, 900mm rangehood and dishwasher. This opulent space is finished with a vaulted ceiling, walk in pantry and plenty of storage and cupboard space.
Entertaining is a breeze with a private courtyard that opens up from the sliding doors off the living area so combining the indoors with outdoors is seamless. The property backs onto parkland, meaning no rear neighbours and direct access to a peaceful open area perfect for walking your dog or playing with the children. Who needs a backyard!
Other features include split system air conditioner, ducted heating, double lock up garage and side access for a trailer to be safely secured off street.
All this is all available within close proximity to shops, schools and transport. Look no further than 2 Moorcroft Terrace.

Description:
Green Outlook
A fantastic size allotment of 392m2 with generous frontage of 14m, you not only have a great sized backyard but also a huge extension of your side yard, with a pocket green reserve right next door!
Skymont’s masterplan design provides quality streetscapes which compliments the existing landscape.
A mixture of exotic and native species which provide year round interest, presents a unique identity and a range of experiences for future residents to enjoy.
Skymont offers a lifestyle of convenience with established amenities and infrastructure, like Arena Shopping Village and Officer Train Station just minutes away.
With 12 highly regarded schools, both public and private in the immediate area your family’s education needs are well catered for. Close to the proposed Gurdwarra. It's time for you and your family to have room to soar!
SALES OFFICE ADDRESS
155 Peck Road, Officer VIC 3809
Open 11am – 3:30pm Saturday & Sunday. Midweek by Appointment.

Description:
Live the grand lifestyle
A truly exceptional and grand 38sq Carlisle family home is now available for you to create memories of your own and is positioned in the prestigious Grandvue Estate in Officer.
This flawlessly presented home creates a modern and luxurious ambience with substantial space and quality features throughout. From the moment you arrive you will be impressed by the stunning street appeal drawing you in to discover how truly spectacular this home really is, with its thoughtfully designed floorplan enticing 3 separate living zones and 4 bedrooms to ensure there is space for all family members to enjoy.
The front master suite features a walk-in robe and luxurious ensuite with a double vanity, spa bath and oversized shower. The additional three bedrooms are all fit with double built in robes serviced by the main family bathroom and separate toilet.
Moving throughout the home storage and living space has not been forgotten. Offering a generous size living room to the front, rumpus or theatre room to the rear, not to mention the large open plan kitchen, dining and a living zone in the centre. This quality kitchen itself is sure to impress the family chef equipped with stainless steel appliances including, 900mm oven and cooktop, dishwasher, inbuilt microwave, ample bench / cupboard space as well as an impressive butler’s pantry with built in sink and oven.
Additional luxury features include, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, split system cooling, security system, high 9ft ceilings, powder room, excellent storage, floating floors, speakers and projector in the theatre room.
Stepping outdoors you are welcomed with a great sized pergola area perfect for entertaining family and friends. Leading out to a low maintenance yard. This home offers side gate access and a double remote garage with external access so you can store your cars, trailers etc securely. All situated on a hard to come by 630m2 approx. allotment.
The Grandvue Estate really showcases the ultimate family lifestyle with parklands throughout, St Francis Xavier College just a hop, skip and jump away and a short distance to the Arena shopping centre and a variety of take away option, M1 freeway and Cardinia train station.
What more could you ask for in a property? Be sure to inspect as this one will not last long…

Description:
MODERN LIVING – OFFICER
Enjoy spacious living in this stylish three-bedroom three level apartment. This magnificent home includes high quality finishes and represents the highest level of contemporary living in the heart of the cosmopolitan well-established community of Officer. The open plan design and floor to ceiling windows in the living area provide light filled, spacious living opening onto a terrace that is ideal for entertaining.
The exquisitely crafted kitchen has good storage and top of the range finishes including stone benchtops, Westinghouse appliances and modern tapware. Other features include three bedrooms all located on level 3, master with ensuite and private balcony with views over the beautifully landscaped wetlands and Club Officer, separate bathroom including bath, built in robes, carpets, tiles.
To add to the convenience there's a double remote garage with internal access, air conditioning, European laundry, additional storage.
* Walk to Arena shops
* Walk to Cardinia Train Station
* Easy access to M1 freeway
* Zoned for Officer schools
Floorplan available on request and a depreciation schedule has been completed and may be transferred to investors on request once occupied.

Description:
Under contract
This young four bedroom delight would be ideal for both families or investors who may be looking to add to their investment portfolio.
The Master Bedroom includes its own Ensuite and Walk-in Robe, featuring a large living area, meals area and exceptionally sized bedrooms, which will make resale in many years to come very easy.

A gorgeous street in the Aspect Estate, where peace and quiet are the norm not the exception, whilst being close to all the major amenities such as Shops, Schools, Public Transport and only a few minutes to the Monash Freeway.

Description:
A Spectacular Level of Family Living
This charming Porter Davis home creates a modern and luxurious environment with substantial space and quality throughout.
From the moment you lay eyes on this stunning property you will immediately be drawn in by the warmth & endless possibilities that this amazing home has to offer. The front master suite features an enticing walk-in robe and ensuite with a double vanity and oversized shower. The three additional bedrooms all with double built in robes serviced by the main family bathroom and separate toilet. The floor plan of this home has been thoughtfully designed offering 4 bedrooms plus study and 3 separate living zones to ensure there is plenty of space for growing families.
The main hub of this home is where the open plan kitchen, meals and large living zone is, being integrated with so much natural light. The kitchen is sure to impress the whole family, with the added luxury of stainless steel appliances, ample bench space, 900mm oven/cooktop, dishwasher and breakfast bar. Directly off the zone you also have a theatre room / 3rd living zone, ideal for those quiet nights in or to keep the kids occupied.
Entertaining is effortless from the indoors out, with doors which open out to a great sized decked pergola area complete with, café roller blinds, lighting and a built-in bar! Leading out to the rest of the yard all positioned on a 576m2 approx. block.
Other great inclusions are, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, NBN available & double remote garage with internal & external access.
Located in the highly sought-after Arena Estate, positioned within walking distance to the Arena shopping Plaza, St Francis Xavier College and a hop skip and jump to the park, only a short distance to Cardinia Train Station and M1 Freeway. If you are looking for quality, space and a desirable location then look no further. You will not be disappointed.
**Theatre room equipment negotiable**

Description:
INVEST IN YOUR FUTURE
With Officer being one of the top growing suburbs as rated by realestate.com why wouldn’t you buy in Officer? Whether it is for yourself or for investment this opportunity will not be around for long so do not hesitate.
On offer is this young and well-built townhouse, just a stone throws away from all the local amenities you need to be able to settle in and enjoy your new surrounds.
On entry of the home, the first level offers two bedrooms both with built in robes and easy access to the family bathroom and powder room.
Access to and from your double garage and ample under stair storage.
Continuing to the second level you will be greeted with a huge sun kissed open plan living room which flows out to your very own balcony ideal for you to sit out and enjoy your morning coffee and or a glass of wine after a busy day.
An entertainer’s kitchen with stone benches, ample storage and SMEG stainless-steel appliances.
The home also comprises an open plan study which could also be used as children’s play room or even a nursery.
The master bedroom comes complete with full ensuite and walk in robe.
Creature comforts include panel heating in all bedrooms, downlights, roller blinds and split system air conditioning and one of the only townhouses in the development that features a private courtyard.
Currently leased at $1651 per month.
Only a short drive to Officer Train Station, what will be the Officer Town Centre and within close proximity to both Officer, Beaconsfield and Pakenham have to offer – this is the opportunity you have been searching for.
*Identification is required at all inspections
Contact Hayley for further information 0488 049 143

Description:
SUPERB FAMILY HOME IN PARK CENTRAL LOCATION
Located in a desirable Park Central Estate location, this quality family residence positioned on fantastic 448sqm2 allotment will appeal to the most discerning of buyers. This impeccable home offers a master suite with WIR and lavish en-suite with a double vanity and oversized shower. Bedrooms two and three also have WIR’s and the bedroom four includes BIR.
To the rear of the home you will find main bathroom with stone vanity tops and separate shower/bath, large power room as well as secondary living perfect for private retreat area.
The stunning open-plan family living area & striking designer kitchen boasts a butler’s pantry, stone benchtops, tiled splash back & quality s/s appliances. Entertaining year round is easy with glass sliding doors providing a seamless transition from the main living area to the large decked alfresco area.
Added features include remote controlled double garage with internal access, ducted heating, split system cooling, spacious laundry, low maintenance gardens and high ceilings throughout. Complete with spacious design, quality finishes and classic modern style, only on inspection will you be able to truly appreciate what this property and its location have to offer
Conveniently located in close proximity to Beaconsfield shops, schools and public transport, Officer Secondary College, Officer train station and the new proposed Officer town centre.
This modern home is a polished package that includes all the upgrades you’d wish for in other homes.
For enquires of this exceptional property always contact Liza Hickey on 0481 185 038 or see us at our open for inspections.

Description:
Triple Storey living in Officer
AGENT ONSITE: Under Construction (see open times)
Offering a nearly completed townhouse. Located in the popular Parkview Terraces development in the fast growing suburb of Officer.
Featuring a triple storey floorplan, this architecturally designed home is spacious and comes complete with an attractive list of turnkey inclusions.
- Walk to Lakeside shopping centre
- Walk to Cardinia Rd Train Station
- Quick and easy access to major roads
- Close proximity to primary and secondary schools
- Considerable stamp duty savings for owner occupiers
- 6 Star Energy Rating
$10,000 first home owner grant applies.
*Inspections - There will not be a home to inspect internally, however there will be an agent on site to show you around the development.
Not to be missed! Enquire to find out more information.
